image-alt: A room with tall tables and craft supplies.
title: Equipment
paragraph: The MILL is a place where everyone on campus can have access to emerging technologies, making resources, and an innovative culture of learning. We have a number of different tools available for use by students, faculty, and staff.

image-alt: A room with tall tables, craft supplies, and a TV screen.
title: Laser Cutting and Engraving
paragraph: The MILL has a Glowforge 3d laser printer that can cut and engrave acrylic, wood, and vegetable-tanned leather. The Glowforge can be reserved by U of I students, staff, and faculty.

image-alt: A room with tall tables, craft supplies, a TV screen, and 3d printers.
title: 3D Printers
paragraph: The MILL has four Bambu P1S 3D printers, all of which can be reserved by U of I students, staff, and faculty.
